profile.name: Michael Koziarski
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer | Developing scalable systems with Go and instrumentation tools
profile.summary: Highly motivated software engineer with a passion for building robust systems. Proficient in multiple programming languages, including Ruby, Scala, C, Java, Lua, and Go.
profile.company: Based on the provided information, I would recommend Menlo Ventures as a potential employer for Michael Kozi

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer at Menlo Ventures
description: Developing scalable systems with Go and instrumentation tools
Collaborating with cross-functional teams to design and implement robust APIs

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Working on file attachment management, asset packaging, and memcached clients for various clients
Pivoting to Scala in 2012 and back to Ruby for a while before exploring other languages

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Contributing to various open source projects, including cassandra_object and AFNetworking
Understanding how to design robust APIs and work with distributed databases
